text: Kollywood is the Tamil film making industry based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The following are the highest grossing Kollywood movies. The Tamil film industry made the first nationally distributed film across India in 1948 with Chandralekha. ==Highest-grossing films Worldwide== #+ Implies that the film is multilingual and the gross collection figure includes the worldwide collection of the other simultaneously filmed version.
